content: or similarly IO.println s!"{repr $ reduce (Term.add (Term.val 2) (Term.val 2))}" will correctly calculate "Term.val 4"

If you add the instance

instance : Inhabited Term := ⟨.val 0⟩

and then replace the sorries with (for example) panic! "goAdd", then you can #eval and it'll give a runtime error if those cases run.
Yuri de Wit has marked this topic as resolved.
